thread.title: David Beckham hires cyber-security experts to find hackers
thread.title_full: David Beckham hires cyber-security experts to find hackers

title: David Beckham hires cyber-security experts to find hackers
text: Share this article Share The Mirror also reported that Beckham's public relations adviser Simon Oliveira has made contact with British police to discuss an investigation into the hack. Police officers have launched a probe in Portugal, where information was hacked from servers of Doyen Global, the firm run by Mr Oliveira. Marclay Associates did not comment when contacted by The Mirror. BOMBSHELL EMAILS Beckham to PR man Simon Oliveira on the Honours Committee: They’re a bunch of c**** I expected nothing less... Who decides on the honors? [sic] It’s a disgrace to be honest and if I was American I would of [sic] got something like this 10 years ago... It’s p****d me off those old unappreciative c**** Beckham to Oliveira: Katherine Jenkins OBE for what? Singing at the rugby and going to see the troops plus admitting to taking coke… F*
